business.headline: Dalal Street's losing streak: Why the market fall may not end soonThe earnings growth of Nifty50 companies was 5% in the October-December quarter, marking the third straight quarter of single-digit growth, which is a sharp contrast to the double-digit profit growth seen in the previous two years.
Sensex, Nifty end marginally lower in volatile session; small and midcaps gainThe S&P BSE Sensex ended 28.21 points lower at 75,939.18, while the NSE Nifty50 settled 12.40 points lower at 22,932.90.

FIIs continue to dump Indian stocks: What it means for your investment portfolioWith FIIs selling aggressively, smallcaps and midcaps bleeding, and China attracting inflows, here's what retail investors should do.

Tesla likely to set up shop in India, may invest $3-5 billion: Sources During their visit, Tesla executives are expected to hold meetings with officials from the Prime Minister's Office (PMO) and other key ministries.
Small SIP, big returns: Check how Rs 250 a month can grow to Rs 17 lakhSBI Mutual Fund's new JanNivesh SIP is making investing more accessible, letting anyone start with as little as Rs 250 a month.

Reliance is India's most valuable company. Check top 10 firms in Hurun India 500The 2024 Burgundy Private Hurun India 500 report values Reliance at Rs 17.5 lakh crore. TCS comes in second at Rs 16.1 lakh crore, and HDFC Bank takes third place with Rs 14.2 lakh crore.

Dr Reddy's, Aurobindo Pharma: Why pharma stocks fell in early trade today?The Nifty Pharma index dropped as much as 2% in early trade. Sun Pharma fell nearly 2%, Dr Reddy's dropped as much as 4%, and Aurobindo Pharma sank almost 6%. Cipla shares also fell.

Tata Motors shares get boost after CLSA upgrade. Check target priceTata Motors share price: At around 11:04 am, shares of Tata Motors were trading 0.34% higher at Rs 683.90 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). It was up over 1% in early trade.

Hexaware Technologies shares debut at 5% premium over IPO priceHexaware Technologies IPO listing: The listing was largely in line with expectations, as the grey market premium (GMP) had disappeared ahead of the debut, indicating weak demand.
Sensex, Nifty open lower as IT, pharma stocks drag marketsThe S&P BSE Sensex shed 291.20 points to 75,676.19, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 88.65 points to 22,856.65 as of 9:25 AM.

Quality Power IPO: Check allotment status, latest GMP and listing date Quality Power IPO allotment status: Investors who applied for the Quality Power IPO can check their allotment status through the BSE website or the registrar's website (Link Intime India Private Ltd).

Elon Musk's Tesla hunts for land in India, Maharashtra leads: ReportWhile Maharashtra is leading the race, other states are also vying for the project. Tesla's plans could change depending on the incentives offered by different states.

Unified Pension Scheme to roll out from April 1. Check eligibility and benefitsUnder the new pension scheme, government employees will contribute 10% of their basic salary along with DA, while the government's contribution will rise from the previous 14% to 18.5%.

ELSS explained: Check tax benefits under Section 80C and other key details ELSS offers market-linked returns and has the potential to generate higher long-term returns as compared to other Section 80C options, including PPF, ULIPS, and NPS, etc.

Trump's reciprocal tariffs could hurt Indian exports. Which sectors are at risk?While officials are still waiting for details on how these tariffs will be calculated, they are already preparing countermeasures and working on a trade deal proposal to reduce tariffs and boost two-way trade.

Sensex, Nifty bounce back from day's low to close flat; IT stocks lead recoveryThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 29.47 points to close at 75,967.39, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 14.20 points to end at 22,945.30.

Want to save taxes? Try these 5 last-minute investment options to maximise benefitsThe Equity-Linked Savings Scheme (ELSS) is a popular tax-saving tool available under Section 80C, offering a lock-in period of three years. Under this, investments up to Rs 1.5 lakh are eligible for deductions.

Sugar gets costlier: Prices rise 6.5% in a month as output dipsSugar price hike: A drop in sugar output, caused by adverse weather and the reopening of sugar exports after two years, has led to a supply shortage, pushing up prices.

New Income Tax Bill: Will taxpayers with late ITR filings lose refunds?Late ITR filing refund concern: The Income Tax Act, 1961, does not prevent taxpayers from claiming a refund just because the return was filed after the deadline.

Licious, backed by Temasek, preps for massive $2 billion IPO: Report Delightful Gourmet Pvt, the parent company of Licious, is expanding its physical store network and improving delivery times to compete with quick-commerce rivals.

Smallcap stocks are bleeding. What should investors do?Smallcap stocks have been battered by the persistent selling by foreign institutional investors (FIIs). A dismal Q3 earnings season has only worsened the situation.

Indian Overseas Bank rolls out Aadhaar-based account opening. Check detailsThis new initiative allows customers to open savings bank accounts online with minimal documentation, as per Reserve Bank of India's eKYC guidelines.

Sensex, Nifty tumble again as volatility grips Dalal Street. 3 things to knowStock Market Today, 18 Feb 2025: Dalal Street remains under pressure with no immediate relief in sight. Here are some key points investors should know.

Tesla eyes India entry for third time. Why EV giant's last two attempts failedTesla in India: Tesla has made two previous attempts to enter the Indian market, both of which ended in failure.  Here's a look at the reasons behind its past setbacks.

Tesla hints at India entry with jobs post days after PM Modi meets Elon MuskTesla has begun hiring in India and has posted several job openings. This comes shortly after Tesla CEO Elon Musk met with Prime Minister Narendra Modi during his recent visit to the US.

Dalal Street continues to be volatile: What should investors do? Dalal Street volatile: The S&P BSE Sensex gained 57.65 points to settle at 75,996.86, while the NSE Nifty50 added 30.25 points to close at 22,959.50. Despite this recovery, overall market sentiment remains cautious as investors react to various global and domestic factors.

How a change of name caused Bira a loss of Rs 80 crore. Check details Ahead of its IPO, B9 Beverages Private Ltd, the owner of Bira beer, changed its name to B9 Beverages Ltd, causing several compliance hurdles and sales disruptions.

New Income Tax Bill: 10 FAQs you should knowNew Income Tax Bill 2025 explained: The current income tax bill which was enacted in 1961, and came into effect in 1962, consisted of 512,535 words and 819 sections. On the contrary, the new bill consists of 259,676 words, 23 chapters and 536 sections.
Sensex, Nifty recover losses to end marginally higher amid volatilityThe S&P BSE Sensex gained 57.65 points to close at 75,996.86, while the NSE Nifty50 added 30.25 points to end at 22,959.50.

Regulatory body warns against rising NPS scams, issues these guidelines The Pension Fund Regulatory and Development Authority (PFRDA) has cautioned subscribers of the National Pension Scheme (NPS) and Atal Pension Yojayna (APY) regarding fraudulent calls demanding money to release pension funds.

Government may set up reserve fund for stable EPFO interest rates: ReportThe labour and employment ministry is conducting an internal study to explore the creation of an interest stabilisation reserve fund under the EPFO, sources said familiar with the matter.

PM SVANidhi scheme: Know about eligibility and Rs 30,000 credit cardsPM SVANidhi scheme eligibility: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman in her Budget 2025 speech announced providing credit cards under the PM SVANidhi scheme.

Is your money safe in co-operative banks safe? RBI's latest curbs raise concernConcerns over New India Co-operative Bank's financial stability and a potential Rs 122 crore scam prompted the RBI to take strict action. This incident has added to the growing list of cooperative banks facing regulatory action.

India Inc sees worst quarter in 5 years: What it means for stock market? The recently concluded Q3 earnings season has been the weakest for India Inc since the first quarter of FY21, according to a report by domestic brokerage firm Motilal Oswal.

Radhika Gupta on market volatility: Bad times don't last. Good investors doRadhika Gupta's advice comes as stock markets continue to witness a downward trend, with the sell-off in smallcap and midcap stocks intensifying.

Senco Gold share price tumbles 32% in 2 sessions. Here's what brokerages saySenco Gold stock price: The sell-off started on February 14 after the company reported its quarterly numbers showing profits plunged 69.3% to Rs 33.48 crore compared to Rs 109.32 crore a year ago.

Markets down, volatility up: 3 factors making Dalal Street investors nervousThe NSE Nifty50 has stumbled, dropping 3.2% in just eight trading sessions and slipping below the psychologically important 23,000 mark. The Sensex tells a similar tale of woe, falling over 3% to fall below 76,000.

TCS to issue hike letters soon; salary raise likely between 4-8%: ReportThe annual salary hikes at leading IT firms have gradually reduced over the years. In FY24, TCS employees received an average hike of 7-9%, while in FY22, the hikes were around 10.5%.

entertainment.headline: Aashram 3 part 2 trailer: Bobby Deol is back as the menacing Baba NiralaThe much-awaited Aashram returns with Part 2 of Season 3, directed by Prakash Jha. The new season delves into themes of power, betrayal, and revenge.

New Matthew Perry documentary promises to dig deep into the Hollywood tragedyA new Matthew Perry documentary called Matthew Perry: A Hollywood Tragedy will be out later this month, wherein the makers will investigate the untimely death of the Friends star.

The First Frost review: Love, trauma, longing - new Chinese drama delivers it all Released-Thu Feb 20, 2025The First Frost review: This Chinese drama delves into the complexities of love, trauma, and longing, offering a poignant narrative that diverges from typical romance tropes. With its melancholic visuals and dual perspectives, it explores the tangled history between its protagonists, making it a compelling watch.

Uorfi Javed's mother on her bold fashion: Was shocked at first, but I support herUorfi Javed revealed her mother was the first in their family to try Botox. Her mother also recalled her reaction when she saw Uorfi's "new style".

Suzhal 2 trailer: Kathir takes on gripping murder mystery with Aishwarya RajeshThe official trailer of the highly-anticipated second season of the Tamil crime thriller Suzhal - The Vortex was released on Wednesday. Starring Kathir and Aishwarya Rajesh in lead roles, the series will premiere on Prime Video on February 28.

Rihanna 'thankful, humbled' after A$AP Rocky found not guilty in shooting caseA$AP Rocky was declared not guilty in a felony assault trial, leading to an emotional embrace with Rihanna in court. After the verdict, the singer issued her first statement, expressing relief.

Retro hits to soulful music: Magical evening at Papon's Valentine's Day special showPapon's concert in Delhi, hosted by TV9, was an unforgettable night filled with soulful music. Held at Major Dhyan Chand National Stadium, the event was part of the World Travel and Tourism Festival.

Watch: Arijit Singh attends father's video call during live concertArijit Singh's live concert in Chandigarh was made memorable by a surprise video call from his father during his performance. The singer shared heartfelt moments from the event on Instagram, expressing gratitude to his fans.

Pics: Singer Anuv Jain married, shares photos with wifeSinger Anuv Jain, popular for songs like Baarishein, is now married. He shared photos from the wedding and pre-wedding festivities on social media.

Singer Akhil Sachdeva on Diljit Dosanjh's infrastructure remark: I feel it's amazingSinger Akhil Sachdeva discusses the rise of concerts in India, film vs indie music, ticket prices, and Diljit Dosanjh's comments on concert infrastructure. He also stresses the importance of crediting technicians.

K-slate 2025: When Life Gives You Tangerine to Wife of a 21st Century PrinceKakao Entertainment is set to make 2025 a landmark year for K-dramas and films, with a rich array of releases across various genres. From gripping thrillers to heartwarming romances, the lineup promises stellar performances and captivating stories.

Dabba Cartel trailer: Shabana Azmi, Jyotika promise an addictive showThe trailer for Netflix's Dabba Cartel unveils a gripping crime drama about five women whose dabba business unexpectedly plunges them into the dangerous world of a drug cartel.

Kim Sae-ron's father blames YouTuber for death, co-star Won Bin breaks downSouth Korean actor Kim Sae-ron's father spoke out at her funeral, held a day after her death, highlighting the emotional distress she suffered due to a YouTuber's videos.

Amit Trivedi: Global artists performing in India is nothing but pure businessIndia has become a hotspot for global artists to perform, drawing big names like Coldplay, Ed Sheeran, and Dua Lipa. Music composer Amit Trivedi believes their choice is driven by business interests, as they seek lucrative opportunities in the country.

Bridgerton 4 first look: Benedict-Sophie's love story takes centre stageThe fourth season of Bridgerton is set to spotlight Benedict Bridgerton's romance with Sophie Baek. New characters like Katie Leung's Lady Araminta Gun will add intrigue to the season.

Legends of Shiva: Amish Tripathi gets real about Lord Shiva in his latest showAuthor and producer Amish Tripathi returns as host of Legends of Shiva with Amish, a new show on Discovery Channel, exploring Lord Shiva beyond myths. Unveiled at the New Delhi Book Fair, it promises a deep dive into mythology coinciding with Maha Kumbh 2025.

Amortage review: Jisoo's album shakes things up like an 'earthquake'Jisoo's new EP, Amortage, released on February 14, 2025, marks her evolution as a solo artist. The EP blends pop and R&B to explore love's many facets, featuring English tracks and her own songwriting.

Bhabiji writer Manoj Santoshi battles cancer, Shilpa Shinde takes care of himActor Kavita Kaushik made an emotional post on social media, highlighting screenwriter Manoj Santoshi's struggle with liver cancer. She also mentioned actor Shilpa Shinde and thanked her for taking care of him.

The Witch review: Jinyoung, Jeong-eui shine in slow-burning psychological mysteryReleased-Sat Feb 15, 2025The Witch review: The Witch, a new K-drama starring Jinyoung and Jeong-eui, captivates with its psychological mystery and slow-burning narrative. The series, based on a popular webtoon, blends mystery, romance, and suspense, leaving viewers intrigued by the enigmatic characters and their complex interactions, says our review.

Rashami Desai on love-hate bond with Sidharth Shukla: We'd communicate through eyesActor Rashami Desai, who had worked with the late Sidharth Shukla on 'Dil Se Dil Tak' and 'Bigg Boss 13', was reminded of her relationship with him on comedian Bharti Singh's podcast.

Stray Kids' Felix suffers fracture after car accident, misses group's fan meetFelix, a member of the boy band Stray Kids, suffered an arm fracture in a minor car accident, causing him to miss the band's fifth fan meeting.

South Korean actor Kim Sae-ron wanted to make a comeback to films, open a cafeSouth Korean actor Kim Sae-ron, who was found dead in her apartment on Sunday, had wished to make a comeback to the entertainment world, revealed a friend recently.

Gajraj Rao, Renuka Shahane's Dupahiya to bring laughter and chaos to Prime VideoPrime Video's Dupahiya is set in a crime-free village where the first-ever theft of a motorbike creates chaos and drama. Starring Gajraj Rao and Renuka Shahane, the comedy series starts streaming on March 7.

South Korean actor Kim Sae-ron, 24, found deadSouth Korean actor Kim Sae-ron, known for her roles in Bloodhounds and The Man from Nowhere, was found dead at her home in Seoul. She was 24. Authorities are investigating the circumstances of her death, with no signs of foul play reported yet.

The White Lotus S3 review: Predictable? Yes. Addictive? Also, yesReleased-Mon Feb 17, 2025The White Lotus Season 3 review: The White Lotus returns with a new season set in Thailand, offering a fresh cultural backdrop while retaining its biting satire on the ultra-rich. The series continues to entertain with its dark humour and ensemble cast, though its formula is starting to feel familiar. Read our full review.

Kanye West says he fought 5 hours for Grammy tickets amid guest list confusionRapper Kanye West, in a post on X, revealed that he fought for five hours to secure Grammy tickets amid guest list chaos. This comes amid claims that Kanye arrived at the event uninvited.

Comedian Anubhav Bassi's Lucknow show cancelled after warning over foul languageThe shows of comedian Anubhav Singh Bassi in Lucknow were cancelled due to concerns over inappropriate content, following a complaint by the UP Women's Commission vice-chairperson. Authorities cited potential law and order issues as reasons for the cancellation.

Watch: Chum Darang blushes as Karan Veer confesses love on Valentine's DayKaran Veer Mehra confessed his love for Chum Darang on Valentine's Day. Chum shared a post from their romantic outing on social media.
Watch: Ed Sheeran pauses Delhi concert as fan faints, wears Team India jerseyEd Sheeran wrapped up his India tour in Gurugram on February 15. He paused his concert briefly to help a fan who fainted.

Shalin Bhanot reacts to India's Got Latent Row, advocates self-disciplineTV actor Shalin Bhanot has reacted to the controversy surrounding YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia's comment on India's Got Latent during the FDCI's India Men's Weekend in Jaipur. He emphasised self-discipline and responsibility.

Today is a victory: Jay-Z reacts after rape lawsuit against him droppedIn a significant legal victory, rapper Jay-Z has seen a sexual assault lawsuit against him dismissed. The rapper and entrepreneur expressed relief and satisfaction over the court's decision.

No one can save him: Mahabharat actor threatens Ranveer Allahbadia Actor Saurav Gurjar openly threatened Ranveer Allahbadia over his recent remarks on India's Got Latent. In a video message, the actor requested the government to take strict action against the podcaster.

Drake releases new album amid feud with Kendrick Lamar, fails to impress fansDrake appears to have ended his feud with Kendrick Lamar in his latest album, but fans remain unimpressed. Released on Valentine's Day, the album in collaboration with PartyNextDoor marks his first new work since the Super Bowl halftime show.

Bharti Singh supports Samay Raina amid India's Got Latent controversyComedian Bharti Singh supported Samay Raina amid the India's Got Latent controversy. The comedian praised Samay and said that he is very sweet, and anyone can become his fan once they get to meet him.

Women's panel summons Elvish Yadav over remarks against Chum Darang on Feb 17YouTuber Elvish Yadav has been summoned by a women's panel following his racist remarks against Chum Darang. Yadav criticised her name and nationality, sparking courage among northeastern citizens.

Apoorva Mukhija aka Rebel Kid removed from official IIFA ambassador listApoorva Mukhija, known as Rebel Kid, has been removed from the IIFA ambassador list following controversy over her appearance in Samay Raina's show, India's Got Latent. The decision follows threats from Karni Sena to disrupt her upcoming shoot.

Fighting zombies to playing a psychopath: The many faces of Choi Woo-shikLong before Choi Woo-shik became a household name thanks to Parasite, he had already amassed an impressive filmography. On this week's K-Fix, we'll have a closer look at his notable works, crafted long before his Oscar-winning turn in Parasite.

general news.headline: Trump hints at US poll meddling over USAID fund: Have to tell Indian governmentDonald Trump's latest remarks come as he continues to defend the Elon Musk-led Department of Government Efficiency's move to cut the $21 million funding for India, while questioning why the country needs it despite its strong economic position.

Rekha Gupta's oath as Delhi's 4th woman Chief Minister at mega ceremony today   Live UpdatesRekha Gupta won the Delhi Assembly polls from Shalimar Bagh defeating AAP candidate Bandana Kumari by over 29,000 votes. She is set to become the fourth woman Chief Minister of Delhi after Sushma Swara, Sheila Dikshit and Atishi.

Litmus test for Rohit Sharma, Gautam Gambhir as India seek Champions Trophy gloryIndia begin their Champions Trophy 2025 campaign on Thursday, February 20 against Bangladesh. Captain Rohit Sharma has already confirmed that the Men in Blue will be backing their spinners at the Dubai International Stadium.

Move fast or you won't have country left: Trump's message to 'dictator' ZelenskyyDonald Trump launched a scathing attack on Volodymyr Zelenskyy, calling him a "dictator without elections" and blaming him for the Russia-Ukraine war, amid raising tensions.

iPhone 16e launched in India: Price, full specsApple has officially launched the iPhone 16e in India. The device comes with a starting price of Rs 59,900. Here are full specs, features, design and India price details.

Reflects PM's vision: Rekha Gupta ahead of taking oath as Delhi Chief MinisterRekha Gupta spoke to India Today's sister website, AajTak, hours before her swearing-in ceremony and said that her taking the oath as Delhi Chief Minister reflects PM Modi's vision of women empowerment.

India Today impact: UP cops crack down on sale of Kumbh bathing photosAn India Today expose revealed how photos and videos of women taking a ritual bath at Maha Kumbh were being shared online through social media accounts.

Delhi cabinet: Parvesh Verma, Kapil Mishra among six to take oath as ministersParvesh Verma, Kapil Mishra and four other BJP leaders will take oath as Delhi cabinet ministers today during Rekha Gupta's swearing-in as Chief Minister of the national capital.

Pics: Alia and Ranbir dazzle, Kareena stuns at cousin Aadar Jain's mehndiAadar Jain and Alekha Advani had their Mehndi ceremony today, which was attended by the Kapoors including Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt Kareena-Karisma, Neetu Kapoor and Randhir Kapoor. Stars like Jaya Bachchan also attended the celebrations.

Hope she fulfils promises: Arvind Kejriwal after Rekha Gupta picked Chief MinisterAAP chief Arvind Kejriwal and outgoing Chief Minister Atishi said they hoped Rekha Gupta would fulfill all the promises BJP had made to the Delhi residents.

Trump considers distributing 20% of DOGE savings to American citizensPresident Donald Trump said his administration may return 20% of savings from Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) to Americans, with another 20% going toward federal debt reduction.

Video: Athlete dies after 270-kg weight falls on her neck during training at gymNational-level powerlifter, Yashtika Acharya, died after 270-kg weight she was trying to lift fell on her neck during training at a gym in Rajasthan's Bikaner.

Jet, set, go where? Will India pick F-35 or indigenous stealth fighter?With Rs 15,000 crore already committed to the indigenous Advanced Medium Combat Aircraft programme, will India take Donald Trump's F-35 bait or stay the course?

2 dead after two small planes collide midair in Arizona A midair collision between two small planes near Marana Regional Airport in southern Arizona killed at least two people Wednesday, authorities said. One plane landed safely, while the other crashed near a runway and caught fire.

Who is Rekha Gupta, and why BJP chose her Delhi CMThe BJP has picked Rekha Gupta, a three-time councillor, as the Chief Minister of Delhi. In picking Gupta, who started her political career with the Delhi University Students Union elections, the BJP has tried to cement a legacy and convey a message to its women voter base.

Champions Trophy 2025: India should take the punt with Pant over KL RahulThe Indian team management maybe backing KL Rahul as the No.1 wicketkeeper at the moment but the champions trophy could be the right platform to take the punt with Rishabh Pant.

Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava is now tax-free in Madhya PradeshVicky Kaushal and Akshaye Khanna-starrer Chhaava has been made tax-free in Madhya Pradesh. Chief Minister Mohan Yadav announced the news on his official X page.

Car crash injures 3 of family, leads to discovery of 3 bodies at home in KolkataThree members of a family were found dead at their home while three other members were involved in a road accident in Kolkata.

US Senator goes after Musk over DOGE, internet hits back with PayPal referenceUS Senator John Fetterman shared a news report about DOGE allegedly trying to access private taxpayer data. Elon Musk and other people on the internet were quick to fire back at Fetterman and brought up the Tesla CEO's past role at PayPal.

The $21-million USAID joke, and it isn't on IndiaUSAID used $21 million of American taxpayer money to boost voter turnout in India, according to Elon Musk's DOGE. India has been spending more on elections than the US and sees a better voter turnout too. That's the $21-million joke. On a serious note, the money could have been used to interfere in India's electoral process.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
